msbt.message: I don't believe we've met. I'm . And you are? What a lovely name you have there, . It's a pleasure to meet you. Well, if you're ever looking for a friendly face during your island vacation, you know where to find me.

Well, there's a fresh face. Are you visiting from another island as well?Of course you are. Well, my friends call me . And you are? ! All the way from , even! Isn't that fascinating. Well, we may only be here a short time, but I do hope we get to know each other better. You don't know this about me yet, but I am ALWAYS down to dish, darling.

I confess, I thought I might never run into anyone else here!I was starting to feel like a castaway on a deserted island, . Then there you were! What a relief!Anyhoo, I'm . It's a pleasure to meet you, . So you're visiting all the way from , are you? Lovely.Well, I do hope this island lives up to our expectations. I suppose there's only one way to find out.
Spending time on an island like this is so relaxing. I feel like a movie staroff on an exotic vacation. Ah yes, I could easily spend the rest of my days basking in this sort of island life, .
Eh, I'm glad you understand me. I suppose one must have dreams.I suppose I'll just have to enjoy the time I have here and then bask in the memories I take home with me.

What? Are you quite serious? If I remember right, you said you're from ? It would be quite the adventure and, of course, you would be thereThat settles it, then! I'll move to and start a new life there, .

Wonderful! I will start preparing to move right away! Buthow to proceed, I wonder? Ah, a simple call to this Tom Nook fellow from should suffice? That I can do. I'm so glad I came here today! Who knew this one trip would change my everything?! Life is funny like that. Sometimes it hands you a present out of the blue!
This island has SO many potential resources, it's a DIY lover's dream, .
I'm almost certain no one has ever lived on this island before. It's just sofull of nature.

You know, I brought some tools with me, but they broke! Just like that, if you can believe it! I was so upset, ! I didn't know WHAT to do.Thankfully, Wilbur happened to have spares, and he let me trade in some Nook Miles for new ones. Honestly, I can't believe my luck. Then againmaybe it wasn't luckMaybe Wilbur just knows exactly what kind of trouble his customers will get themselves into out here.

HmmI might have to cut my trip short. After all, I have lots of packing to do and calls to make! I must tell ALL of my friends about my big move, of course.I wonder, will they miss me? Or will they just be jealous of me?Either way, I'm about to be one very busy , !
I can't believe a little island trip led to such a big adventure.It's a good reminder You never know what life might have in store for you.
My new home on your island I can see it nowIt will be a design masterpiece, of coursebold, yet demure vibrant, but subtle Just like ME, darling!
